name: BetterMemorySugarBot
description: Now you will not forget about next infusion set or CGM sensor change! This app remembers for you!

app_name.description: please type it again :) it has to be the same

LANGUAGE_CODE.description: yours application and messages language. ('en' or 'pl')

NIGHTSCOUT_LINK.description: http link to your nightscout website, where last change data will be downloaded from. (settable later)

INFUSION_SET_ALERT_FREQUENCY.description: numbers of hours between your infusion set changes. (settable later)

SENSOR_ALERT_FREQUENCY.description: numbers of hours between your CGM sensor changes. (settable later)

ATRIGGER_KEY.description: yours API key from atrigger.com (settable later)

ATRIGGER_SECRET.description: yours secret API password from atrigger.com (settable later)

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate; python manage.py create_default_admin;python manage.py collectstatic
